Html:
Is there a way to read xlsx file using for loops with the use of row and column indexes? Because I want to keep track on the column indexes.

who among you guys can help me with this? I am new to this project.

 

thanks

Instead of this:

$worksheet->getCell('A1');
You can use this:

$worksheet->getCellByColumnAndRow(0, 1); // column base 0, row base 1
